metadataAttributes.Title: Modern Data Warehouse Analytics in Microsoft Azure
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: In this course, you will learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore the processing options available for building data analytics solutions in Azure. You will explore Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Databricks, and Azure HDInsight.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Data Visualization Software,Data Warehousing,Analytics,Microsoft Azure,Data Visualization (DataViz),
